author: davidlt
body:
Avoids the following on GCC 7+ on C++17:

```
Validation/RecoVertex/src/TrackParameterAnalyzer.cc:48:38: error: call of overloaded 'basic_string(TString&)' is ambiguous
```

This happens because `TString` has two conversion operators, one to `std::string_view` and another one for `const char *` and `std::string` has ctor for both of them.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov <David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch>
title: Replace TString with std::string to avoid C++17 issues
